description: The fabric performance of Ferrosi, now upgraded with the functional pockets and design of cargo pants. This Ferrosi spinoff uses the same updated eco-friendly fabric that is 45% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Cargo Pants - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved 48% Recycled Nylon, 38% Nylon, 14% Spandex
